sentence.Network_en: They righteously maintain that they do not practise rationing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一本正经地坚称不实行定量配给制度。

sentence.Network_en: She waxes righteously indignant if anyone tries to contradict her.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果有人想反驳她,她说起话来就会义愤填膺.

sentence.Network_en: Elliott Freemantle held up a hand self - righteously.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利奥特· 弗里曼特尔 装得义形于色地举起一只手.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... righteous 公正的 righteously 公正地 righteousness 正当.
rigen-相近词汇-新浪字典 ... right-wing 右翼的,右派的 righteously 端正地;正直地 righteousness 正义,公正,正直.
凛然的英文翻译，凛然用英语怎么说... ... 凛然不惧 stern and fearless 大义凛然 righteously 凛然正气 awe-inspiring integrity.
懂英文的帮个忙_百度知道 ... 大公无私 = unselfishly 见义勇为 = righteously 孜孜不倦 = diligently.

list.abs: 所谓「原义」（original righteousness），乃指道德方面的上帝的形像，此乃包含：（1）知、情、意的完全和谐，都顺服上帝的旨意 …
A great man would rather be a sacrifice for righteousness than live in dishonor ., 伟人宁愿为正义牺牲 , 而不愿忍辱偷生.
安仁... ... 岗仁波齐 Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet; 假仁假义 hypocrisy;pretended righteousness 榄仁树 terminalia catappa.
Live like a deity象一尊神似地活着Live righteously正大光明地活着Logical empiricism逻辑经验主义

entry.tran: 正直的;正义的;正派的;（有时指）假正经的，道貌岸然的
entry.def: If you think that someone behaves or lives in a way that is morally good, you can say that they are righteous. People sometimes use righteous to express their disapproval when they think someone is only behaving in this way so that others will admire or support them.

example.ex: Aren't you afraid of being seen as a righteous crusader?...
example.tran: 你不怕被人看作是一个装腔作势的改革者？

example.ex: He was full of righteous indignation.
